manufacturer: Erwin Hymer Group North America, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Erwin Hymer Group North America, Inc.

summary: THE VEHICLE IN AN RV WITH TWO 12V HOUSE BATTERIES. THE CABLES LEADING TO THOSE BATTERIES HAVE SEEMINGLY FAULTY SWAGING, RESULTING IN THE CABLE SLIPPING OUT OF THE FITTING ON THE BATTERY, AND THE BARE COPPER END OF THE CABLE IS LOOSE IN THE BATTERY COMPARTMENT. IF THE POSITIVE CABLE SHOULD COME LOOSE AND TOUCH CHASSIS GROUND, IT WILL SHORT THE OTHER BATTERY. *TR
